contentrichtext.text: {{for|the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft|Uder (Verwaltungsgemeinschaft)}} {{Infobox German location |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Uder.png |Wappengröße = 100 |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 21 |lat_sec = 45 |lon_deg = 10 |lon_min = 4 |lon_sec = 17 |Lageplan = Uder in EIC.svg |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Eichsfeld |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = Uder |Höhe = 230 |Fläche = 13.90 |Einwohner = 2543 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 37318 |Vorwahl = 036083 |Kfz = EIC |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 61 097 |Straße = Siedlung 14 |Website = [http://www.gemeinde-uder.de www.gemeinde-uder.de] |Bürgermeister = Gerhard Martin |Partei = CDU }} '''Uder''' is a [[Thuringia]]n municipality in the district of [[Eichsfeld (district)|Eichsfeld]] in Germany. {{Cities and towns in Eichsfeld (district)}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Eichsfeld-geo-stub}}
